text: Proton: It's getting dark, we'll stop by atnearby town soon.
[Outer Town, Territory of Static]
(The streets are full of people, shouting andmoving chaotically)
Proton: I did not expect the town to be so busythis late at night...
???: Hey, you just get here?
Proton: Yes, we have just arrived.
???: Then you probably haven't heard the newsyet, have you?
Proton: News?
???: The Holy Itucher has been discovered atthe Nation of Altar.
Quest: The Holy Itucher!?
Quest: You mean to tell me that an artifactwas discovered while I was away on this mission!?
???: You all know the legends, right?
???: 'bout how the "worthy one to wield theHoly Itucher will be granted the power of theDimensionals"?
Quest: Of course I do, I'm the Head of ArtifactResearch in the Territory of Static!
???: As you can tell, everyone in town is rushingto head to the Nation of Altar.
Proton: What about you?
???: I'm on my way to the Nation of Altarmyself.
???: My cousin works there at the temple, soI'll know the way there better than the others.
???: I can help you guys get there if youhave the gold, you know?
Proton: You'll do that and miss out on gettingit for yourself?
???: Me? The chosen one? Don't make me laugh.
???: If I'm not getting the power I might aswell get some money.
Quest: Hiring him or not, we should head thereimmediately. Who knows what could happen if theItucher got into the wrong hands.
[Recruit ????](Q) Recruit(W) Do not recruit
???: Alright then, good luck getting toAltar.
Proton: Even though it's nightime, will need to headto Altar immediately.
Proton: The world will be in danger if the Holy Itucheris used for evil.
[Chapter 07][Cos Path, Territory of Cos]
